gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.lucy: The Leucistic is probably the most famous axolotl type!§ö§öLeucistic or Lucy are the most common Axolotl.§öNormally Leucistic Axolotls have a pink tone of color.§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.wild: The Wild most closely resembles the specimens from Lake Xochimilco!§ö§öWild have little details on skin.§öNormally Wild Axolotls have darker tones or brown color.§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.gold: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.cyan: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.blue: The Blue is a suggestion from r/Minecraft to Mojang!§öThe Blue Axolotl is based on the Mudkip Pokemon.§öBlue Axolotls are the most rare ones in Minecraft Vanilla, although some people think it exists in Realife, it doesn't!§ö§öObtained: Rare Breeding
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.albino: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.black: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.chimera: The Chimera morph type is like a fuse!§ö§öChimera have little details on skin like wild.§öChimera morphs are created when two eggs fuse together in development, and each side grows according to the egg it came from.§ö§öObtained: Breeding Lucy, Wild
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.enigma: The Enigma morph is one of the most interesting ones.§ö§öEnigma's details are parts of the skin of Gold and Black, a mix of beautiful colors making an unique texture.§ö§öObtained: Breeding Gold, Black
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.firefly: The Firefly morph has two colors, Black and Albino.§ö§öThere are only less than a dozen specimens of this type in the world that were created by Lloyd Strohl II.§öThe most beautiful part are the split colors!§ö§öObtained: Breeding Black, Albino
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.firefly_i: The Firefly morph has two colors, Black and Albino.§ö§öThere are only less than a dozen specimens of this type in the world that were created by Lloyd Strohl II.§öThe most beautiful part are the split colors!§ö§öObtained: Breeding Black, Albino
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.lapis: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.neon: The Neon/Green is a variant that Mojang wanted to add but never did!§ö§öThe variant is probably based on GFP Axolotls.§öThe first time it was shown is in the Caves And Cliffs Update Trailer.§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.glow: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.piebald: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Breeding Black, Albino
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.gray: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Natural Spawning
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.drowned: The Drowned, the forgotten sea creature of the depths of the sea.§ö§öThe design of the Drowned Axolotl was inspired by the Drowned Zombie.§öIt has cyan eyes and has moss all over it's body.§ö§öObtained: Rename to "drownelotl"
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.shiny: The Shiny is the shiny version of the Blue Variant!§öThe Design is based on the Shiny version of Mudkip Pokemon that the Blue Variant represents.§ö§öObtained: Rare Breeding
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.mosaic: No detailed description provided§ö§öObtained: Breeding Lapis, Lucy
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.skeleton: The Skeleton, the companion of the hostile monsters.§ö§öThe design was inspired by the Skeleton.§öIt only consists of bones and has no gills nor skin.§öAlthough it's probably already dead it behaves like any other axolotls.§ö§öObtained: Rename to "skelotl"
gui.more-axolotls.catalog.desc.rainbow: The Rainbow is probably the most mind blowing axolotl!§ö§öThese axolotls can change the color of the pigments in an extraordinary way.§öThese cases are resulting from a rare genome of axolotls that can occur in really rare cases.§ö§öObtained: Rare Breeding
